messages.msgSnippet: ... We only love it when it isn t hot and humid or when we have a hurricane blowing us around!  :)  I do miss having 4 distinct seasons and being able to take
messages.messageBody:
On 5/21/06, lesliel23 <lesliel23@...> wrote:
>
> Michelle,
> I know this wasn't directed toward me, but I had to butt in and say
> we go to Pensacola ALL THE TIME! We love it! You are so lucky to
> live there. It is beautiful!
> Leslie


We only love it when it isn't hot and humid or when we have a hurricane
blowing us around! :) I do miss having 4 distinct seasons and being able
to take advantage of really long days in the summer and very long nights
during the winter like we had in Oregon, but this is home. Let me know next
time you head this way and I'll round up the other unschooling families!





--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr
Ask me how you can save 60% on some of our most favorite products!

messages.messageBody:
Michelle,
I know this wasn't directed toward me, but I had to butt in and say
we go to Pensacola ALL THE TIME! We love it! You are so lucky to
live there. It is beautiful!
Leslie
